column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary
Please provide information on any UFO information that has been logged for St.Helens over the past 30 years.

Please advise on the cost of obtaining a copy of the Crichel Down Rules. Please provide a copy of the central record from 2004 for Gloucestershire, North Somerset, Oxfordshire, South Gloucestershire and Wiltshire.
Please provide a copy of the central record from 2004 for Surrey.
Please provide details of the Vector Aerospace contract.

Please provide a copy of the 09/10 claims report document. Please advise on the total paid out in each financial year under the Armed Forces Compensation Scheme from 04/05 to 09/10 along with an estimate for 10/11.

Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the number of MDPGA police officers and civilian support staff/employees arrested for alleged offences related to 'domestic violence' or assault to their spouse or partner in the last three years up to and including 2010/2011.
Please provide details of all army units that took part in Operation Agila in Rhodesia 1972.
Please provide information and photographs of the cold war bunker located at Bentley Priory, Stanmore, Middlesex.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding UK Armed Forces personnel and the Republic of Ireland.
Please provide a list of all current Royal Naval Flag Officers and Commodores along with their current appointments.
Please provide a list of all Officers holding the rank of Admiral of the Fleet.
Please provide a list of all Commanding Officers of HM Ships and Shore Establishments as of May 2011.

Please provide copies of all documentation held by MOD that mentions and refers to the Council of Europe Report, Inhuman treatment of people and illicit trafficking in human organs in Kosovo written by Dick Marty.
Please advise on the names of all the Royal Navy vessels aboard which Lord Mountbatten served until he retired from active service.
Please provide daily hourly sunshine data information from the London Heathrow station over any ten year period.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the communication and press teams at the Met Office.
Please provide information on British support for security sector reform (SSR) in post-conflict Sierra Leone.
Please provide a copy of the Flying Training Pipeline Rebalancing Policy document dated 15 February 2011.

Please provide copies of the agreed minutes from any TU meetings held between the main TUs and MOD, that occurred between 1 August 2010 and 20 May 2011, relating to civil service staff employed at HQAC.
Please provide a contact e-mail address for the Royal Dragoon Guards and the Signals Officer.
Please provide information to various question regarding Flying Training.
Please provide information on the outcome on the sexual assault of two minors by two crew members of the HMS Ashanti while it was in port in Fremantle Western Australia in 1970s.
Please provide information on the median and average length of service for Royal Navy recruits and promotion.
Please provide information to various questions regarding Flying Training.
Please provide an exhaustive specification of all simulator systems installed in the RACs along with the costs of each components. Please itemise any other further costs that have been incurred.
Please advise on the type of medical aspirators used in theatre.
Please advise and provide details and information on cancelled projects from September 2009 - May 2011.

Please advise where information regarding the 2010 Equality & Diversity questionnaires can be found on the DASA website. Please provide copies of the Equality & Diversity questionnaires for 2008 and 2009.
Please provide information to various questions about promotion in the British Army.
Please provide information on the demographics of the service community.
Please advise and provide information regarding open source intelligence.
Please advise whether responses to the consultation paper for the SDSR White Paper are available to be public and how a copy can be obtained.
Please provide a  copy of the meteorology report giving observations of precipitation 5km from station 2057Z after the detonation of a hydrogen bomb, codename Grapple Y, on Christmas Island in 1958.
Please advise whether the booklet, Regulations for National Service in the Army 1950 (Volume I) included provisions for a National Serviceman to become a trained soldier without passing out.
Please provide information of all incidences of personal data losses in the Department.
Please provide information on the figure for outstanding move-out charges as at the end of the last FY 2010/2011.
Please provide information on the lease of land in South Yard know as PY 1 site (Princess Yacht site 1) and PY 2 site (Princess Yacht site 2).
Please provide information on the accrued costs to date for the disposal of the 87 identified SFA located at Rowner, Portsmouth.
Please advise on the three most common forms of injuries to police officers on duty in FY 2009/10 and 2010/11.
Please provide a copy of the medal card for Alfred Powers.
Please provide information on MoDaf systems architecture.
Please provide pictures of the buildings and layout of RAF Medmenham.
Please advise whether the use of 1,3-Dimethylamylamine (Geranium stem) is permissible as a sports performance supplements that can be used by serving Armed Forces personnel.
Please provide information on the BAE Replica programme alleged run between 1994 and 1999.
Please provide information and details of the MOD's ICT structure.
Please provide MOD's fuel expenditure for 2010-11.
Please provide full details of every germ war test carried out between 22 April 2002 - present.
Please provide information to various question regarding performance indicators auditing complaints.
Please provide information regarding all costs relating to formal complaints by CPO Cartner against MOD.
Please provide a copy of the HFU report into the helicopter accident in Cyprus in 1985.
Please provide information and details of the Met Office's ICT structure.
Please provide information of all incidences of personal data losses by the police.
Please advise and provide information and details of the number of service personnel discharged from the Army, Navy and RAF due to mental health disorders between 2006 - present.
Please advise if the MOD hold any requirement or gap analysis documents.
Please advise on the quantity of pain relief and anti-depressants tablets ordered every year since 2000.
Please advise whether Tucano aircraft are subject to the same minimum height level of 250 feet in an LFA as fast jets or whether it is permissible to fly them lower.
Please provide information regarding GPT Special Project Management Limited or EADS support with Saudi Arabia or its National Guard in the last ten years.
Please advise on the number of staff dismissed over adequate military equipment not being provided in theatre.
Please advise and provide information and details of the numbers of servicemen disciplined and discharged from the services for steroid or supplement misuse from 2001 - present.
Please provide information on the values and costs previously redacted from the report on RAF Bicenster. Please provide the past OS maps and history documents used in the assessment.
Please provide information on the Halifax HR746 accident on 16 August 1943.
Please provide information and details of  DSTL's ICT structure.
Please provide information and details of  DSG's ICT structure.
Please advise and provide information and details of the number of occasions the British Armed Forces have trained foreign Armed Forces or militia.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding ECM radiation.
Please advice and provide information on best practices and benchmarking for MOD security clearance processes and procedures.
Please provide information to various questions regarding weapons seized, discovered, or collected from weapons caches in or near Basra, Iraq from January 2007 - December 2007.
Please advise on the number of family members (i.e. sons and/or daughters) of members of parliament have served on the front line in Iraq and Afghanistan to date.
Please advise on the number and locations of civilians known to have been killed by UK forces since 1 January 2005.
Please advise whether DASA/DESA has been involved in any economic impact assessments for military bases and, if so, whether any information exists in the public domain on the methodology used.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the Commonwealth War Graves Commission HQ Building.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the contract GWS 25 Model 3.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding cigarettes issued to service personnel in ration packs.
Please provide any drawings, plans or cad models of the Challenger 2 MBT.
Please provide historical information on the quarry's usage at Burham Brick and Cement Works in Kent during WWI and WWII.
Please provide a detailed breakdown of all MOD non UK based C2/HEO posts in the Finance, Business Management & Improvement and Corporate support job families.
Please advise on the number of service personnel who leave the forces, as a result if injury or illness, and provide a detailed breakdown (i.e. gender, type of injury, etc)  for the last five years.
Please advise and provide information on RN Officer career service lengths.
Please advice and provide information to various question regarding court martials.
Please provide information on the Mosquito aircraft that crashed in 1944 - 45.
Please advise on the number of MOD civilian investigated for fraudulent Travel & Subsistence claims for the last 15 years.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding driving licence checks for MOD staff driving MOD vehicles or their own vehicle to undertake MOD business.
Please provide a copy of the publication scales used to determine the establishment of medical staff required to support an RAF station.
Please provide copies of all correspondence between the MOD and/or DIO and East Hampshire District Council concerning Whitehill Bordon eco town and eco-town policy.
Please advise on the total number of British military personnel that have been stationed in Italy as part of Operation Ellamy along with information on the amount spent on accommodation and meals.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the two-day meeting at Warwick University to discuss the DIO Transformation Programme.
Please provide copies of any correspondence between HQAC and regional staff concerning the ACO reorganisation meeting/workshop.
Please provide a copy of the letter or email correspondence that was sent to MOD regarding xxxxxx employment tribunal claim.
Please provide information on the policies that set out how HQAC staff are to conduct communications externally.
Please provide details of any external communications between HQAC staff and regional staff concerning aircadetresource.com
Please provide information on all research, consultancy work, etc taken into consideration when formulating the ACO's social networking policy.
Please advise on the number of cadets and staff, along with their locations, that have used each of the regional activity centres in the last year.
Please provide information on all communications between HQAC and regional staff, in the past year, regarding social networking and social networking policy.
Please advise on the creation of the Royal Regiment of Scotland.
Please advise on disclosed costs of projects under the Transparency Agenda.
Please provide a list of image files included in the Army Brand Portal.
Please advise, and provide a breakdown, on the number of Armed Forces personnel that have applied for paternity leave in the past five years.
Please provide information to various questions regarding weapons seized, discovered, or collected from weapons caches in or near Helmand Province, Afghanistan from September 2007 - September 2008.
Please provide confirmation on the number of staff that have been moved from other departments to work on EU defence related matters.
Please provide information and details of the top 200 suppliers to the Ministry of Defence for 2009/2010.
Please advise on the specific working practices that have been changed to minimise unwarranted leaks of information.
Please provide a copy of all credit card statements for all government procurement cards since May 2009.
Please provide a list of medical products purchased by MOD for pharmaceuticals.
Please provide historical information on the bombing of Valløy in 1945.
Please advise whether there are any plans to examine all candidates on the MR 185 medical research list using the 'x-ray fluorescence' technique whilst they are still alive.
Please provide information on the response given to VOLKSWIND UK  who are proposing to install seven 126.5m wind turbines at Melmerby South Wind Farm, near Ripon, North Yorkshire.
Please advise on the number of amputations that have occurred to UK Armed Forces personnel in 2009 - 2010.
Please provide details of AFCS payments for currently serving personnel as at 1 February 2011.
Please advise on the censorship process in place for mail during WWII.
Please advise, and provide information to various questions, regarding many military staff employed at Chequers.
Please advise on the number of personnel in receipt of their pension payments prior to November 2010.
Please advise on the number of people that were on the Fast Stream programme in the MOD in 2008 - 2009, 2009 - 2010 and 2010 - 2011 and the amount spent on training individuals on the programme.
Please advise on the number of third party individuals who hold passes to any MOD sites and the number of pass holders who are former MOD employees or members of the Armed Forces.
Please advise, and provide information, to various questions regarding SERCO contracted services for the provision of marine services for the MOD.
Please provide a copy of the contents pages for the T1 report.

Please advise, and provide a breakdown by type, of the number of cyber-attacks on MOD per month since this information had began to be captured. Please advise on the cost of improving cyber security over the last five years.
Please advise, and provide information, to various questions regarding the misuse of HM procurement cards in the last five years.
Please provide full details of gagging agreements concluded and funded by the department every year since 2001.

Please provide copies of all guidance available to civilian and military medical officers acting in the capacity as military GPs, in relation to compartment syndrome in military personnel, from July 2006 to present.
Please advise on the medals issued to Flt Lt A J Baker.
Please advise on the total litigation costs incurred by the MOD regarding the ongoing Cartner sex discrimination case.
Please provide information on the condition of the Afghan National Police and Afghan Nation Army, including existing personnel and recruits, since January 2011.
Please advise whether the United Kingdom currently claim any maritime zones adjacent to the Sovereign Base Areas in Cyprus.

Please advise on the amount spent by the MOD in the last four financial years (07/08), (08/09), (09/10), and (10/11), on providing private school education to children of service personnel along with information on the numbers of children this entailed.
Please provide information and details of Government Procurement Card transactions where the transactions occurred during FY 2009/10 and 2010/11.
Please provide information and details of Government Procurement Card transactions in DE&S, MDPGA, DSDA, DARA, DMETA, DVA and DASA where the transactions occurred during FY 2009/10 and 2010/11.
Please provide information on the valuation figures from the Crichel Down Rules report.
Please provide information and details of Government Procurement Card transactions at the Met Office where the transactions occurred during FY 2009/10 and 2010/11.
Please provide a list of casualties from the Iraq conflict.
Please provide information and details of Government Procurement Card transactions at DSTL where the transactions occurred during FY 2009/10 and 2010/11.

Please provide any information on the availability of files with reference: DEFE 19/224 - Incidents or accidents involving MOD nuclear materials or nuclear facilities: includes contingency planning and DEFE 19/36 - Assistant Chief Scientific Adviser (Nuclear) Nuclear Intelligence.
Please provide a copy of the Terms of Reference for the Province Executive Committee.
Please advise and provide information on the cost of the last service voyage of HMS Ark Royal.

Please advise on the total cost, to the taxpayer, of private education for children of MOD employees, the amount spend on schools within Wales or whose UK address is in Wales, over the last five years.

Please provide information regarding the decommissioning of the Royal Yacht Britannia. This should include all correspondence, emails, minutes, agendas, policy papers, briefing notes and any other relevant information.
Please provide information and details of meetings held between MOD and EDS in 2006 and 2007.
Please provide copies of statements and witness testimonies on the coroner's inquest into the death of MOD researcher Terrence Jupp in 2002.
Please provide a copy of the MOD's organisation chart of senior officials prior to 1987.

Please advise on the total cost of the current operation in Libya, from the start of the current action.
Please provide a list, including indices of contents, of all Land Force Standing Orders (LFSO).
Please provide the name and address details of the successful bidder for the UK-Andover: Technical Support Services 2011/S 108 177745 and other companies shortlisted in the bid.

Please advise on the issuing of HM Forces Veterans Lapel Badges.
Please provide a copy of the 20101208 - Conclusions of a Meeting of the SIB (3 Dec 10) - RSM.
Please advise on the how much the MoD has spent each year since 2000 on medical contractors, of all types, and GP locums, abroad and in the UK.
Please provide information and details of UFO sightings in the West Sussex airspace for 2010-11.

Please advise on the availability of AP 3342 Management of Physical Education in the Royal Air Force.

Please provide copies of all correspondence and documentation regarding the disestablishment of 1 x PPPA case worker post in Lisburn, NI in 2011.

Please provide a copy of the Abnormal Events report for each of the 18 incidents that occurred at AWE, plus any other Abnormal Events reports for any further incidents which may have taken place over the same period ( 25 September - 31 December 2009) and resulted in enforcement action .

Please provide copies of any reports, memos, correspondence, notices or other information held on emergency plans or exercises of the Scottish operational berths at Loch Ewe and Broadford Bay relating to the suspension of permission for their use.

Please provide information to various questions regarding the UFO incident in Woodbridge (Rendlesham Forrest) in 1980.
Please advise and provide information to various questions regarding the medal review during June 2010 - June 2011.

Please advise whether the MOD have an authoritative database that details the technological effectiveness of weapons they procure and if information from it can be provided.
Please advise whether the MOD has been subject to any attempted cyber attacks since 2010.
Please provide information to various questions regarding MOD, Help For Heroes and Tedworth House.
Please advise whether any members of the Armed Forces under 18 were permitted to serve in military action, during the Suez Canal zone, during 29 October - November 1956.

Please advise on the number of service personnel that have died whilst on operations in Iraq and Afghanistan since October 2001 that were parents and the number of children and ages of children that have been bereaved as a result.

Please provide a copy of BR677, RN BR31 and Form F Med 133.

Please advise on the number of people who have received a severance package and the total amount of monies paid out in the last five years.
Please advise on the number of sick leave taken by staff in DIO/DE in the last five years and the cost.

Please advise whether staff in DIO still receive stress and strain days. Please advise on the total number of stress and strain days taken by staff in DIO/DE in NI in the past five years and the cost.

Please advise on the total amount of money paid under the Armed Forces and Reserve Forces Compensation Scheme to injured servicemen and women between 1 April  2010 to 31 March 2011. Please provide a breakdown of tariff and tariff level of injury.

Please provide a list of positions on the Defence Council along with historical information of past membership from 1964.
